name: Muc-Off C3 Wet Ceramic Chain Lube
description: Extra long lasting lubricant.  This liquid lube is designed for wet or muddy conditions, reducing friction for a more efficient ride.Easy to use in a drop-on application.Fine point tip lets you apply to hard-to-reach places.Boron nitrite and ceramic formula reduces friction with long-lasting performance.Prevents corrosion between links and plates in your chain.Suitable for road, MTB and cyclocross bikes.95 % biodegradable formula.UV torch included.
